channel.title: Toucan
channel.description: The Markdown-based static site generator written in Swift

item.title: Beta 2 is now available
item.description: The second beta release of Toucan is now available. This release includes many improvements and some new features.

item.title: Beta 3 is out
item.description: The third beta release of Toucan is now ready try. New pipelines, queries, iterators and more.

item.title: Beta 3 migration guide
item.description: Migration guide for Toucan Beta 3: covering changes to content structure, theme changes and rendering features.

item.title: Beta 4 is available
item.description: Better control over your assets and content. Improved API support.

item.title: First beta release
item.description: Toucan 1.0.0-beta.1 has been released, featuring custom block directives and other minor enhancements.

item.title: Introducing Toucan: a new Markdown-based static site generator
item.description: We're thrilled to announce the development of Toucan, our new lightweight static site generator built using Swift.

item.title: Last alpha release
item.description: Toucan 1.0.0-alpha.3 is now released, this article will help you to understand the changes and to migrate your site from alpha 2.

item.title: Toucan is now ready for alpha testing
item.description: Hereâ€™s how you can try out Toucan, our brand-new static site generator, developed entirely in Swift.
